meta.title: Product Details
meta.description: 0.25% Trypsin with EDTA and phenol red; calcium- and magnesium-free. Sterile-filtered for efficient dissociation of tissues and adherent cell monolayers.

product.name: Trypsin (0.25%) with EDTA & Phenol Red
product.intro: Formulated at 0.25% trypsin with EDTA and phenol red. Free of Ca2+ and Mg2+, sterile-filtered, and well-suited for rapid dissociation of tissue pieces and adherent monolayers with robust lot-to-lot consistency.
